article.title: Status and history for [men]
article.para: See the Github repository for issues and changes in 2023 and after.

history.history-entry: Replaced all the occurrences of U+0186 Ɔ LATIN CAPITAL LETTER OPEN O by U+0254 ɔ LATIN SMALL LETTER OPEN O and all the occurences of U+0190 Ɛ LATIN CAPITAL LETTER OPEN E by U+025B ɛ LATIN SMALL LETTER OPEN E. Replaced all the occurrences of U+002D - HYPHEN-MINUS by U+2010 ‐ HYPHEN. Thanks to Denis Moyogo Jacquerye for pointing out the mistake.
stage 4: OHCHR identified as the source, complete XML contributed by Adobe Systems.
